title: Sell Knob Creek Limited Editions
metaTitle: Sell Knob Creek Limited Editions | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Knob Creek 12 Year, 15 Year, 18 Year, and 2001 Limited Edition bottles. We buy rare Knob Creek bourbon and rye.
heroSubhead: We buy aged and limited Knob Creek releases directly.
introParagraph: While Knob Creek is a staple bourbon, its limited and age-statement releases are highly collectible. We purchase Knob Creek 15 Year, 18 Year, 2001 Limited Edition, and 25th Anniversary bottlings. We also buy older 12-year releases. Sell your limited Knob Creek bottles for a direct cash offer.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Recent Knob Creek 12 Year (unless part of a collection)
photoChecklist: Seal condition (wax on some, foil on others)
conditionFactors: Wooden box condition is important for premium releases
pricingFactors: Age statement (18 Year and 15 Year are higher value)

faqs.question: Do you buy Knob Creek 9 Year?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy standard Knob Creek 9 Year unless it is an older bottling (pre-2010).

faqs.question: Is Knob Creek 18 Year valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, the 18 Year is a limited, highly-aged release that holds significant value compared to standard bottlings.

faqs.question: Do you buy Knob Creek Single Barrel picks?
faqs.answer: We purchase select private barrel picks, especially those aged 14-15 years, which are becoming rarer.

faqs.question: What about the 25th Anniversary?
faqs.answer: The 25th Anniversary single barrel is a key bottle we look for. Please include the box photo.

faqs.question: Do you buy Knob Creek Rye?
faqs.answer: We buy limited Knob Creek Rye releases, such as Cask Strength or twice-barreled editions.

faqs.question: How do I sell my bottle?
faqs.answer: Fill out our simple form or text us a photo. We'll give you a price and handle the rest.
